name: Life Learning Academy
description: Life Learning Academy (LLA) located on Treasure Island is a SFUSD charter high school serving 70 students ages 14-18 involved or at-risk of involvement in the juvenile justice system and/or who have challenging life problems including school failure, family problems, poverty, abuse, gang involvement, and substance abuse. Programs: - Academics - Building Community - Social Emotional Learning - College Readiness

howToGetIt: To apply for an admissions interview or arrange a site visit, please call 415-397-8957 and ask for Kelly Baker, Executive Assistant. If you or a young person you care about wants to try a different path, please contact us. Same-day or next-day appointments with Teri Delane, Executive Director, are always available. Accepted students often start at Life Learning Academy the day after the interview. Just call.
